LanguageData.VFEM2_RoyalJellyDraught.label: royal jelly draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_RoyalJellyDraught.description: A shimmering golden liquid. When the user drinks it, it significantly improves their immunity gain speed, enhancing their body's natural defenses against diseases and infections. Additionally, this draught boosts the user's consciousness and movement speed, sharpening their mental alertness and enhancing their physical agility. Upon consumption, it also lowers the progress of any ongoing infections by 5%.
